contest-event.event-date:
May 9, 2009 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Contest Music Winter Gardens (Opera House Theatre), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK Solo prize went to solo cornet from Tredegar, Dewi Griffiths. May 10, 2009, 10:39 a.m. Aug. 20, 2011, 3:39 p.m. 1 Rothwell Temperance Band David Roberts 2 The GUS Band John Berryman 3 Mount Charles Brass Band Andrew Duncan 4 Tredegar Town Band Ian Porthouse 5 Flowers Band Garry Cutt 6 Newstead Brass Duncan Beckley 7 Bactiguard Wire Brass Paul Andrews 8 Sovereign Brass Trevor Jones 9 Reg Vardy Band Russell Gray 10 Redbridge Brass Jeremy Wise 11 Thoresby Colliery Ian McElligott 12 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band Mark Bentham 13 Freckleton Band Gareth Pritchard 14 Wingates Band John Hinckley 15 Jaguar Land Rover Band Dave Lea 16 Tongwynlais Temperance Band Philip Harper 17 City of Hull Band Frans Violet 18 Kibworth Band John Hudson 19 Aveley and Newham Band Nigel Taken Withdrawn Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band Richard Evans
